responses: Hi there, how can I help?
Bye, let me know if you need help again

patterns: I need help with my order
I need help understanding this product
responses: Ok, let me look through the store

patterns: I'm not happy with my product
responses: I'm sorry to hear that, let me see what I can do

patterns: How long will it take to be delievered?
When will my order be delievered
responses: Yes, for $13.99 extra delivery can be expedited
For standard it is 5 - 10 business days. For expedited it is 2 - 5 business days

patterns: I need to return an order
responses: To return an item, send it back to this address within 90 days of purchase to recieve a full refund
